response.overview: Bok-hee’s splendid years have faded, and now she finds herself in old age. Having lost her husband and with her daughter living separately, she leads a solitary life.  One day, a club opens across her house. Late at night, Bok-hee is stirred from her sleep by the music resonating from the club—it sounds familiar. It’s the same tune she used to dance to with her friends when young.  Fueled by nostalgia, Bok-hee decides to visit the club, hoping to relive those cherished memories. Yet, upon arrival, she is greeted by a reality far from her expectations.
response.title: Dancing Grandma
